text: Namiet gata dum hai ureueng mukmin Jilakee izin meunan tapeugah Lhee go siuroe izin jilakee Meunan meuteuntee mangat bek salah a e Meunan pih aneuk nyang goh troh umu Bek tamong laju lam kama bagah Nyang phon yoh goh lom seumbahyang suboh Goh lom tabeudoh tapujoe Allah ‘Oh tasuet bajee bak watee leuho r Watee pajoh bu tapiyoh payah h Meunan pih ‘oh Iheueh sumbahyang ‘isya Nyan ‘aurat gata beu tapeusiblah r Jilakee izin lhee boh watee nyan ‘Oh Iheueh nibak nyan gata pih bebaih Dijih pih ka jeuet jiteubiet tamong Peue nyang meukeunong jipeubuet bagah Meunankeuh Tuhan dum Neupeunyata y Keu gata tanda tatueng phaedah Tuhan Neuteupeue bandum peurkara Lom bijaksana-Neuh han ban peugah
